China's yuan ousts dollar to become most traded currency in Moscow in 2023The Moscow Exchange trading volume in Chinese yuan surpassed that of the U.S. dollar in 2023, the Kommersant daily reported on Tuesday, as Moscow pursues a de-dollarisation strategy in the face of Western sanctions on its financial system.
